title: LFG GGLoL Tournament #1

embed.description: Gaming Gurus' very first OCE League of Legends tournament! Think you have the ultimate team to take the winning prize...

body:
Hello!
We are looking for competitors in OCE region to join in on our tournament, this was inspired purely for fun and meeting other players!

Come compete and rake in rewards of RP and more!
Registrations are open between **10th -> 25th May**!

For more details follow the link via battlefy for more details such as team conditions, rules and check-in periods on tournament day!
Thank you so much for reading and we hope to meet some of you fellow gamers there!

> PS: Please contact us for a code to participate!

https://imgur.com/KpFYEBg
